transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	wildcardPaths:['*_registration.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive({ns0:serialNumber} = toString(byName('ns0:serialNumber')),
		{env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialRegistrationInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialRegistration_ns0:branches'][0]['ns0:statuses_ns0:code} = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialRegistrationInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialRegistration_ns0:branches'][0]['ns0:statuses_ns0:code')),
		SourceFileName = SourceFileName) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['bss_all_register_data.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
